      • Structure

        public Structure()

      • Structure

        public Structure(int dID,
                 int y,
                 int cRule,
                 int wRule)

        Parameters Constructor

        Parameters:
        dID - Position of the correctly classified example
        y - Class of the "dID" example
        cRule - Position in the rule set for the rule that correctly classifies the "dID" instance
        wRule - Position in the rule set for the first rule that wrongly classifies the "dID" instance
